CustomField.formula: and( or( Status1__c = "Active", text(Status__c) = "Active" ), or( today() <= Recognition_Date__c, Is_Escape_Deal__c ), or( RecordType.Name= "Multi-Line Expense", and( RecordType.Name= "Single-Line Expense", not(CONTAINS(Description__c,"Credit")) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Process ER
